title: LoL OCE Artist Community Club!
body:
Hey there Artists of the OCE community! :D

I've created a club called <Artist Community> and I was looking to find any artists out there looking to be in a creative group of people on league who might discuss art, collab, play games together or are just willing to have a good time with one another.
It's a harsh world out there for Artists and I think if we all bundled up together like little poros perhaps we could take this world by storm! >:D

Anyone interested please contact me @StudioVulcan (twitter) or add 'Unbroken' on the OCE league region to join the club! Or alternatively, leave a comment down below and i'll add you as soon as i can!
Thanks guys! <3

P.S I've created a discord group that we can use if the group becomes popular :)

replies.body:
I'm game, I could always use more folks to play League with and I'd like more artist friends. Mostly a support main, but can ADC where necessary. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> [{quoted}](name=Unbroken,realm=OCE,application-id=NjEElsTI,discussion-id=n7r5BPlE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-26T23:38:14.121+0000)
>
> Added you <3

Ta~! Message me over the client for my discord, I don't want to post it here. ^_^

Bump ladies and gents. Where are all of the artists at?! :P
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
